name: Spaceduck Orchestra
description:
This game was created at the Ubisoft Game Jam 2019. The point of this jam was to create a game that did not rely on  confrontation.

The team behind Spaceduck Orchestra:

Producer                -   Soren Wagner

Game Designer  -   Paulina Pabst

Programmer        -   Frederik Trampenau

3D Artist                -   Emre Karabacak

3D Artist                -   Kevin Skok

3D Animator        -   Ilka Hesche

Composer              -   Jeremy Froböse
